tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Thank you for being such a kind and thoughtful voice when we needed it most. We had lots of ups and downs during my pregnancy but you always encouraged and guided us in each and every phase. We thank you for all the patience and compassion you had shown during my journey.  Truly appreciate it.  #BestGynecologist

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Prenatal Checkup,Labor and Delivery,Pregnant Women Counseling,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
I want to thank you doctor for being a guide & friend throughout my pregnancy and delivering to me a bundle of joy on 10th of April, 2022.  
Even after a emergency c section (post 14-16 hrs of labor) , I recovered smoothly in a matter of 2 weeks .. thank you for being there just a call/ msg away for any doubts or issues I had through the last 9 months. 
I highly recommend Dr. Monika especially to first time mothers..

tags: None
review: ** ****** ** * ***** ******* ************* She is a patient listener, ************ ************* and committed professional. She cares for her patients across the 24-hour and during critical period. She has wonderfully consulted the patient during covid-19 pandemic.
reply_text: Thanks a lot fr ur kind words ! üôè

review: Doctor was very polite and friendly. She understood the problem very well and explained it to us very nicely.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: She is a great doctor who is very dedicated towards her work . She makes the patient feel at ease and is always available at the time of need . Sincere and hard working .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She helped me understand the entire situation and gave me tests and medicines. Once the reports were out, she explained me every point and thus helped me in understanding my own body situation.
I am really thankful to her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Very understanding and kind. :)
She took ample time to explain me the problem and the medicines to be taken to relieve me of the pain.

tags: None
review: blessed to have her during covid lock down...she guide us on almost everything...very polite and genuine...she handled my complicated twin pregnancy so easily... always recommend!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Its my 1st pregnancy, and right from the 1st visit she has been taking care of me like a mother takes care of her child.. no words can describe how friendly and comfortable she makes me feel.. Always answers my queries even on phone..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Under Dr Monika's supervision my pregnancy period  went very smooth and without any major issues . She always explain the medical issue faced by me,  in a very informative language,  which is easy to understand for me. She doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines. She only advices the pathological tests which are necessary.
